title: Make a lower quality champion select
body: After last patch getting in a game with my low fps pc has gotten way harder. The first thing I can see when I get there is the ban time. Can't prepick anymore. Sometimes I can't even join the champ select before the bans so for the system I'm a game leaver. Can't you make a lower quality champion select without all the flashy effects and sounds? Thank you in advance for your time.

replies.body:
This may not have to do with the quality, but the strength of your connection losing sync an leaving you behind in champion select.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network and strengthen it.  

Just to be safe, though, you can also enable [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode to remove the aesthetics in champ select that can cause some pc stress.  I hope that helps!
